Context: The George Brown College Foundation is a registered charity that supports student success at the college. Donations made to the foundation go directly towards providing emergency funding for students in any program who face financial struggles. Every donation results in a tax receipt being issued. To learn more about the foundation and sign up for updates, visit their website or contact them via phone or email. The phone number is 416-415-2000 and TTY is 1-877-515-5559. The email address is ask.george@georgebrown.ca. The information on the website is subject to change without notice. It should not be considered as a representation, offer or warranty. Students are responsible for verifying George Brown College fee requirements.
